    • findTarget

      public Message findTarget​(int mode, Message playerPosition)
      Chase mode: If more than 8 units away from Waka (straight line distance) target location is Waka. Scatter mode: Bottom left corner
      Specified by:
      findTarget in class Ghosts
      Parameters:
      mode - current ghost mode
      playerPosition - position of the player
      Returns:
      the target position
